animeTitle: My Master is Fierce but Adorable
synopsis: 27 years old workers encountered a car accident through, possession to the 14-year-old beggar Luo Xiao Qi body resurrection. She accidentally meets the two big beautiful men who are looking for the whereabouts of the prince in front of a plot -- little Lord and son. Poison tongue less master by a strange combination of circumstances became Xiao Qi's master, and gentle son was her "old acquaintance". The true identity of small beggar and former dynasty also have the connection of innumerable strands, who is everything backside in layout? The truth behind the fog is waiting to be revealed.
